actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit export restrictions that interfere with existing contracts for the exportation of agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Prohibits the Government from taking any action to restrict farm exports in a manner which interferes with otherwise valid export contracts which were entered into before such action is taken, except to the extent such contracts provide for delivery more than nine months after such action is taken.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit export restrictions that interfere with existing contracts for the exportation of agricultural commodities.
